content_html: Katari, Sept 18: The Koshi Provincial Hospital here will provide free outpatient department (OPD) services from today. The hospital will provide the service free of charge after Katari Municipality decided to reimburse the amount for the service. Chief Medical Superintendent of the hospital, Dr Gaura

title: Free OPD service at Katari Hospital from today
